advancement.enigmaticlegacy.root.title: Enigmatic Legacy
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.recall_potio: Brew or discover the Potion of Recall
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.spellstone_t: Discover or create the Spellstone Table
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.all_spellsto: Collect every unique spellstone  Would there have been a way to combine them all...
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.the_cube.des: Force all spellstones into a shape equally powerful and unnatural, creating Non-Euclidean Cube
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.heaven_scrol: Find or create Gift of the Heaven
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.cursed_scrol: Create Scroll of a Thousand Curses
Equip the Ring and embrace the Seven Curses
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.the_twist.de: Slay the Wither and create The Twist using Nefarious Essence
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.abyssal_hear: Slay the Ender Dragon and claim Heart of the Abyss
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.the_infinitu: Acquire The Infinitum and become the herald of the Abyss
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.desolation_r: Forge The Burden of Desolation, and bear it
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.the_bless.de: Create The Bless using Sacred Crystal
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.redemption_r: Break the Ring of Seven Curses to obtain redemption
advancement.enigmaticlegacy.unholy_grail: Harness the power of Unholy Grail... but at what cost?
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.ceaseles: Can shoot basic arrows without consuming ammunition.
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.eternal_: Makes the item impossible to unequip or lose on death.
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.etheric_: Enhance the capabilities of Etherium tools
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.nemesis_: Deals 35% of damage back to you for each melee attack.
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.redempti: Increase the damage received, and reverse the effect with redemption.
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.sharpsho: Increased and less random arrow damage.
enchantment.enigmaticlegacyplus.sorrow_c: Sometimes applies random debuffs when receiving damage.
effect.enigmaticlegacyplus.abyss_corrupt: A powerful negative buff that spreads with death.
effect.enigmaticlegacyplus.blazing_might: The effect will be removed after receiving any damage.
effect.enigmaticlegacyplus.ichor_corrosi: Reduce your defense while increasing the damage you receive.
effect.enigmaticlegacyplus.ichor_curse.d: The Nether will resonate with you.
Makes you immune to fire and grants you clear vision in lava.
effect.enigmaticlegacyplus.pure_resistan: Reduce the damage received while having a chance to block damage.

message.enigmaticlegacy.command.getcurse: %1$s is bearing the Seven Curses for %2$s ticks, or %3$s of their time in this world.
message.enigmaticlegacy.command.getnocur: %1$s is not bearing the Seven Curses for %2$s ticks, or %3$s of their time in this world.
message.enigmaticlegacy.command.setcurse: %1$s's time with Seven Curses was set to %2$s ticks.
message.enigmaticlegacy.command.setnocur: %1$s's time without Seven Curses was set to %2$s ticks.
message.enigmaticlegacy.generator_simula: Estimated generation complete in §632768§5 instances; check §6latest.log§5 file to see the results.
message.enigmaticlegacy.cursed_sleep: Seven Curses awaken unspeakable fear and gnawing uncertainty within as you approach the tempting realm of dreams. No hope for the hopeless, no sleep for the sleepless...
message.enigmaticlegacy.permanent_death_:
In attempting the feat, one proves their courage.
May your fractured soul at last find rest.
toast.enigmaticlegacy.slot_unlock.title: %1$s are unlocked!
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.title: EnigmaticLegacy+ Configs
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.superA: The amount of armor points provided when it's bearer has no armor equipped.
The amount of armor toughness provided when it's bearer has no armor equipped.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.damage: How much damage instantly receives any creature that attacks bearer.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.igniti: How how many seconds any creature that attacks bearer will be set on fire.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.shadow: Range in which Pearl of the Void will force darkness to devour living creatures.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.darkne: Base damage dealt by Darkness every half a second, when it devours a creature in proximity of bearer.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.undead: Chance to prevent it's bearer death from receiving lethal amount of damage. Defined as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.natura: The time required for each 0.5HP treatment from the natural regeneration of the Revival Leaf. Measured in ticks.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.painMu: Defines how much damage bearers of the ring receive from any source. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.neutra: Range in which neutral creatures are angered against bearers of the ring.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.armorD: How much less effective armor will be for those who bear the ring. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.monste: How much damage monsters receive from bearers of the ring will be decreased. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.soulCr: The mode of the Soul Crystals loss.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.enable: Set to false to disable Insomnia.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.lootin: How many bonus Fortune levels ring provides.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.fortun: How many bonus Looting levels ring provides.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.experi: How much experience will drop from mobs to bearers of the ring. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.enchan: How much additional Enchanting Power ring provides in Enchanting Table.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.enable: §5Fifth Blessing§d - Special drops of Seven Curses
Set to true to enable extra loot table.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.autoEq: If true, Ring of the Seven Curses will be equipped into player's ring slot right away when it enters their inventory. This is different from ultra hardcore option as the way through which ring ends up in player's inventory does not matter.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.ultraH: If true, Ring of the Seven Curses will be equipped into player's ring slot right away when entering a new world, instead of just being added to their inventory.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.maxSou: Maximum amount of Soul Crystals a player can lose before they won't drop anymore. If set to 10 - player can loose all of them, and doing so will result in permadeath. Each crystal lost subtracts 10% of from their maximum possible health value.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.abyssT: The time needed to enable the Abyss items as a percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.forThe: Enhance the abilities of monsters encountered by the Worthy players.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.giveSt: If true, Mod will grant starter items on first login.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.neutra: The list of creatures that will not be aggressive towards you via the Seven Curses.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.attack: Damage increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
Attack speed increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.moveme: Movement Speed increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.damage: Damage resistance increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.mining: Mining Speed increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.regene: Regeneration increase in unit. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.damage: Defines max reduction rate for any damage suffered by the wearer of ring. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.attack: Defines max increase rate for any damage received from bearers of the ring. Measured as percentage.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.regene: The time required for each treatment. Measured in ticks.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.lootin: How many bonus Fortune levels ring provides.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.fortun: How many bonus Looting levels ring provides.
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.redemp: Time Proportion Required For Each Redemption Level
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.abyssa: Maximum count for obtaining Abyssal Heart
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.etheri: Whether to render the Etherium Shield
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.enderB: Button Offset of Ring of Ender
enigmaticlegacyplus.configuration.quoteS: Show quotes from the Inscrutable Eye
quote.no_peril_1: Where there is no peril in the task - there can be no glory in its accomplishment.
quote.end_doorstep_1: The doorstep of The End... single step now separates you from it.
quote.only_because_1: Only because you have fallen does not yet mean you backed down.
quote.demise_is_1: Demise is but a temporary inconvenience for a demigod such as you.
quote.we_fall_1: We fall, so that we may learn how to pick ourselves back up.
quote.you_will_endure_1: You will endure this loss, and learn from it.
quote.oblivion_rejects_1: Oblivion rejects you... make use of such opportunity, while you still can.
quote.setback_1: A setback, but not a defeat.
quote.death_may_1: Death may impede your conquest, but only broken will can halt it.
quote.eternity_to_keep_1: You have eternity to keep trying. Do what it takes.
quote.violence_calls_1: Violence calls for vengeance. Return, and dispense it!
quote.immortal_1: You are immortal! Return and give that pitiful creature a demonstration of this fact.
quote.appalling_presence_1: The shell is gone... but appalling presence will forever remain imprinted upon this realm.
quote.its_destruction_1: Its destruction is a small consolation... given the implications of its terrible existence.
quote.i_wandered_1: Yes, I wandered those lands many times...
quote.i_wandered_2: A desolate reminder of everything that was, and all that could have been.
quote.another_demigod_1: Another demigod wanders this forsaken land...
quote.another_demigod_2: Let me accompany you in your journey. Perhaps, you will manage that which others could not.
quote.another_eon_1: Another eon, another wanderer. Another story to be told...
quote.another_eon_2: I will observe yours with great curiosity.
quote.perhaps_you_1: Perhaps, you will be the one to uncover the long-forgotten history of this land...
quote.perhaps_you_2: If so, I must bear witness to your accomplishments.
quote.sulfur_air_1: Sulfur in the air, sharp scent of burnt rock and flesh...
quote.sulfur_air_2: This place is a Hell indeed.
quote.tortured_rocks_1: Tortured rocks, pale as bones, hanged up above infinite, all-consuming blackness.
quote.tortured_rocks_2: The End... is almost like a fever dream.
quote.breathes_relieved_1: The world breathes relieved without the burdensome presence of that horror...
quote.whether_it_is_1: Whether it is power, or redemption that you seek in repeatedly returning Wither from and to its grave...
quote.whether_it_is_2: ...at least, you give that damnable creature a purpose.
quote.poor_creature_1: Poor creature... The last of her kind, bound to guard the godforsaken island...
quote.poor_creature_2: ...in the middle of nothingness. Lay her to the deserved rest.
quote.horrible_existence_1: What a horrible existence... Brought back from the dead, only to be slain once more.
quote.horrible_existence_2: You must truly be devoid of compassion.
quote.countless_dead_1: Countless dead souls, merged into abomination of such terrible form that it defies description.
quote.countless_dead_2: The earth is stained by the very presence of this foul creature.
quote.with_dragons_1: With dragon's imminent demise, this place seems even more empty and purposeless than before.
quote.with_dragons_2: Will you wander those fractured, deserted lands...
quote.with_dragons_3: ...or return to the facade of sanity and liveliness the Overworld provides?
quote.with_dragons_4: Of course, we both know the answer... you cannot resist exploring the unknown, be it now or later.
quote.terrifying_form_1: ...its terrifying form is destructible, but not its soul.
quote.terrifying_form_2: It bears curse not dissimilar to yours... Curse of immortality.
quote.toll_paid_1: With the toll paid, you are free from the burdensome swell of hatred and sorrow...
book.enigmaticlegacy.landing_text: In front of you lies the well of great knowledge, a place where some of this world's greatest mysteries belong, scrupulously researched and carefully cataloged.<br2/>As your journey continues and the world reveals itself to you, you may revisit and behold knowledge you gathered within these pages.
book.enigmaticlegacy.category.world.name: The World
book.enigmaticlegacy.category.world.desc: Some choose to mindlessly scavenge whatever they come across for treasures, leaving behind anything else. That isn't an entirely unjustified path, but does it make one any better than those monsters blindly seeking blood in the night?... Sometimes, if you look just a bit closer, ruins and traces of the former ages can tell you a lot about long history before your advent.
You are perfectly familiar with most mundane materials and resources, which this world holds plenty of. But should you dig a little further - and you might discover things even you have never beheld before.<br2/>As you keep seeking new materials to forge better tools and armor from, it would be worth to denote unusual properties of some of them.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.soul_loss.pag: Every death comes with its own tolls, but there is one far more significant than all others you had to face before.<br2/>It does appear that every time you die in this world, a part of your very soul is separated from you, remaining in the place of your demise. It doesn't stay ethereal for too long, instead quickly manifesting itself into physical

reality, in form known as the Soul Crystal. Luckily for you, being a part of this reality actually makes it less vulnerable than otherwise.<br2/>Soul Crystals would float in the air, invulnerable and not reacting to any force acting upon them, as though being only a part of it, soul of

the demigod can only be destroyed by something of a higher nature. Not even other demigods can hope to claim or destroy your crystals.<br2/>With every fragment of your soul lost, you vitality fades, you become weaker and easier to kill. But should you approach your Soul Crystal, and it will lean towards you, and lost fragment of your soul will be instantly freed from its crystal prison, fusing together with your being again.

Hopefully, even under the worst circumstances, you won't lose all your life force. As fabric of your soul thins out, it becomes more and more resistant to being torn apart one more time.<br2/>It is safe to assume that at some point you will not be able to lose any more of your soul fragments, no matter how many times you die - though you would be left in an incredibly vulnerable state to any physical threat by then.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.earth_heart.p: Similar to how there is Heart of the Sea, an item bound with nature of endless oceans and seas covering surface of the Overworld, there is Heart of the Earth, born within its rocky depths and encapsulating some of their raw energy. It can be found in deepest rooms and halls of dungeons deep below the Overworld's surface, lost and forgotten in smothering darkness.

The elemental power this heart holds bears resemblance to that stored within spellstones, but unlike latter it isn't originated from primordial chaos that spelled the beginning of all worlds, instead being born much later, slowly condensating in the earth's crust during many geological eons.

The resulting shape doesn't attend its bearer and does not allow to freely channel unrefined energy stored within, but may serve as core for powerful relics requiring such energy if utilized properly.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.infernal_cind: The blazing flames of hell have left such ashes scattered throughout the Nether. The cinder still flaunt their wrath, seeking an outlet to vent.<br2/>You can use the cinder to create many items, but it's obvious that they are all a bit extreme and full of personality. If you can't handle them well, don't try them easily.
Meanwhile, the compatibility between the cinder and curse is excellent. If you are carrying some curses at the same time, feel free to make bold attempts, as it will not let you down.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.ichor_droplet: For this so-called "blood of gods", you have finally discovered a stable source to obtain, which is to hunt for screaming ghasts floating in the Nether.<br2/>The power of the curse triggered the tiny residual "divinity" in the blood and tears of the ghast, allowing the Ichor to reappear in front of everyone.

However, do not ponder where these 'divinity' actually comes from, as it has long been a secret of ancient times. For you now, all you need to think about is how to utilize and develop this unexpected product. For example, brewing some extreme potions.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.etherium.name: The Etherium
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.etherium.page: Despite the name is has, this material is physically solid. Very.<br2/>Stories have turned out to be true. And even more - they were not exaggerating the truth. Etherium truly has most of the wondrous properties that were assigned to it by pieces of lore you happened across earlier. It has quite high melting point, being just

as resistant to fire and lava as netherite is, while significantly superseding its durability. Apart from that, this metal is overfilled with pulsing energy, urging you to unleash it in any shape or form you can come up with.<br2/>And for being alike you, capability to create shape and form is beyond questioning.
This world will soon behold the might of your newly forged etherium tools.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.astral_dust.p: Concealed within the rooms of End Cities, this elusive substance does possess incredibly interesting properties. Power of all elements seems to be infused and mixed within it, somehow holding itself in relatively stable form. Astral Dust resembles creation itself, chaotic and impermanent, yet somehow frozen in time, allowing you to behold all

beauty of its single instant.<br2/>The arcane power that it holds might be immense, but it requires to be carefully treated and molded to be useful in a constructive way. As time goes by, however, there is no doubt you will discover many possible applications it can have.
With a fine selection of arcane ingredients, those which contain the power of other dimensions, you can alter the earthly nature of Heart of the Sea, transforming it into something different... Vastly more powerful.<br2/>The power of cosmos itself now rests at the palm of your hand. Only time will tell what unimaginable feats can be
achieved with it, what fabulous artifacts can be powered with its reality-bending energies.<br2/>But one thing is for certain - the world will tremble beneath the steps of their bearer.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.twisted_heart: ...and thus, it was you who have chosen this fate. You have surely acknowledged what sorrow and regret this choice will cost you many times in the long journey ahead, but you still have done it. Do you even know why?<br2/>Regardless, there is no way back - only ahead, in an attempt to harness the power of great curses you are now

bound with. This task is hopefully not as complicated as it might seem if you can gain access to required ingredients, as curses themselves seem to actively seek new ways to spread tendrils of their corruption

into the world around you - they just require a little assistance from you.<br2/>As soon as you laid claim upon Heart of the Earth, you have noticed that it resonates with dark power of the ring, setting pulsations of pure energy within it slightly out of tact. This influence is hopefully not strong enough to instantly tarnish the heart, therefore rendering it unusable for regular crafting. But with small amount of carefully selected

arcane ingredients and a fraction of your demigod power involved, you can reinforce the link between the heart's core and curses that you bear, allowing latter to corrupt it and transform into something entirely different.<br2/>Twisted Heart is a product of this unholy ritual, an artifact incarnating part of the great curse, darker and more powerful than what Heart of the Earth used to contain.
While the Nether Star is a core of Wither's physical vessel, this substance is a manifestation of pure energy of its seemingly indestructible and perpetual soul. A tiny fraction of that energy, but it sure has immeasurable potential in your hands.<br2/>It seems to have strange connection to your own cursed being, which is why you were

able to obtain this essence in the first place. It draws closer to you as you approach, as if bent by desire to latch onto you. Perhaps, you could allow it to do so?... No, what a dumb idea that would be.<br2/>But one thing is beyond questioning - this matter contains tremendous amounts
of dark, twisted power, that you just so happen to be capable of harnessing. You will surely find something to do with it.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.pure_heart.pa: With different materials, you may be able to try a production different from Twisted Heart. The combination of hidden dark pollution and faint divinity gave birth to this eerie creation with bright appearance.<br2/>Unlike another type of item, the Pure Heart and its creations typically provide protection and assistance,

rather than aggressive power.<br2/>But although it is a divine creation, it needs to rely on the power of curses, which is too ironic. So when using these items, please also pay attention to the hidden dangers.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.sacred_crysta: Tear apart those seemingly sacred creations and seize the cores of those Pure Ichor Spirits. The crystal is filled with a power unlike any other, pure and sacred, but the curse within your body does not seem to repel it. <br2/>The Pure Ichor Spirit's bizarre resistance and recovery effects have been perfectly inherited in this item, which

can be used to craft some defense-themed items.<br2/>However, what is intriguing is the relationship between the curse and the power inherent in it. Can it be resisted? Can it be reversed? Can it be replaced?...
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.abyssal_heart: When this unearthly abomination fell into your hands for the first time, description-defying mix of feelings have overcome your mind, among which there was a place for terror and excitement, admiration and disgust. The gaze of its lonely eye befell you with intent impossible to comprehend, but once initial wave of emotions retreated - you have

concluded that it poses no threat to you.<br2/>Still, you know not what it truly is, and where it came from. Perhaps your insufferable existence, and efforts to live in spite of Seven Curses were noticed by some unnameable eldritch power, and through your

damnable being it have chosen to channel itself into the world. Perhaps it is a mere accident, a fluke in reality itself that allowed something like this to appear. Perhaps it is your ailing mind that have conceived this horror in some nightmarish fever, and with its growth - corruption of the curses have managed to manifest it into the mortal realm?<br2/>Perhaps it's best to never know, for some truths are much

more unsettling than anything a man's imagination can come up with.<br2/>Regardless, now you are the rightful owner of this thing. And it will not be long before you can put it to some unimaginably violent, frightening use... The world will suffer tenfold for all the suffering it caused to you.
